articles.author: Samuel Stolton
articles.title: Microsoft's OpenAI Ties Face Potential EU Merger Investigation - Bloomberg
articles.description: Microsoft Corp.’s $13 billion investment into OpenAI Inc. risks a full-blown investigation by European Union deals watchdogs, after a mutiny at the ChatGPT creator laid bare deep ties between the two companies.
